mapper.select: SELECT CODE AS CODE_ID, CODE_NAME AS CODE_NAME FROM SYS0094M WHERE IND = 'SIM_BCHTYP' AND DISB = 0
SELECT BRNCH_ID AS CODE_ID, CODE || ' - ' || NAME AS CODE_NAME FROM SYS0005M WHERE TYPE_ID = #{groupCode} ORDER BY CODE
SELECT STK_ID as CODE_ID, STK_CODE || ' - ' || STK_DESC AS CODE_NAME FROM SYS0026M WHERE STK_TYPE_ID IN ('1370', '2687') AND STK_CTGRY_ID IN ('1362')
SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS0094M WHERE IND = 'SIM_BCHTYP' AND DISB = 0 AND CODE = #{params}

SELECT TO_CHAR(B.TRX_DT, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS TRX_DT, C.CODE_NAME AS MOV_TYP, B.MOV_TYP AS MOV_TYP_CDE, CASE WHEN B.MOV_TYP = 0 THEN D.CODE_NAME ELSE E.CODE_NAME END AS MOV_DTL, B.QTY AS QTY, B.RMK AS RMK, B.CRT_DT AS CRT_DT, F.USER_NAME AS CRT_BY FROM LOG0089M A JOIN LOG0091D B ON A.REF_NO = B.REF_PFX_NO LEFT JOIN SYS0013M C ON C.CODE_MASTER_ID = '419' AND C.CODE = B.MOV_TYP LEFT JOIN SYS0013M D ON D.CODE_MASTER_ID = '420' AND D.CODE = B.MOV_DTL LEFT JOIN SYS0013M E ON E.CODE_MASTER_ID = '421' AND E.CODE = B.MOV_DTL LEFT JOIN SYS0047M F ON B.CRT_USR = F.USER_ID WHERE ROWNUM <= 500 AND A.BR_NO = #{BR} AND A.ITM_CDE = #{ITM_CDE} ORDER BY B.TRX_DT, B.SEQ_NO
SELECT CODE AS CODE_ID, CODE_DESC AS CODE_NAME FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_MASTER_ID = '419' ORDER BY CODE
SELECT CODE_DESC FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_ID IN ( SELECT TYPE_ID FROM SYS0005M WHERE BRNCH_ID = #{params}) AND CODE_MASTER_ID = '45'
SELECT CODE AS CODE_ID, CODE_DESC AS CODE_NAME FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_MASTER_ID = #{groupCode} ORDER BY CODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOG0089M ( SEQ_NO, REF_NO, BR_NO, ITM_CDE, CRT_USR, UPD_USR, CRT_DT, UPD_DT ) VALUES ( LOG0089M_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 'SC' || LPAD(LOG0089M_PFX_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 8, 0), #{BR}, #{ITM_CDE}, #{updator}, #{updator}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )

INSERT INTO LOG0091D ( SEQ_NO, REF_PFX_NO, TRX_DT, MOV_TYP, MOV_DTL, QTY, RMK, CRT_USR, UPD_USR, CRT_DT, UPD_DT ) VALUES ( LOG0091D_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{prxNo}, to_date(#{trxDt}, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), #{movTypCde}, #{movDtlCde}, #{qty}, #{rmk}, #{updator}, #{updator}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )

INSERT INTO LOG0090D ( SEQ_NO, REF_SEQ_NO, MEM_ID, SR_NO, QTY, ASG_DT, RMK, CRT_USR, UPD_USR, CRT_DT, UPD_DT ) VALUES ( LOG0090D_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{seqNo}, '', '', 1, SYSDATE, '', #{updator}, #{updator}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
